examples: science eroded the pillars of superstition

definitions.text: anything that approximates the shape of a column or tower
examples: the test tube held a column of white powder
a tower of dust rose above the horizon
a thin pillar of smoke betrayed their campsite
he is a pillar of the community

definitions.text: a vertical cylindrical structure standing alone and not supporting anything (such as a monument)
(architecture) a tall vertical cylindrical structure standing upright and used to support a structure
